Decluttering my wardrobe = excellent. But not my shoes, never never never.

Requested Dolly Parton for this evening's music choice. It's actually really good!
Well, at least I'm finding the cricket in Australia good to watch

Dear Waiouru, you are all sorts of surprising wonderfulness. Except for your caffeine availability; sharpen that up #formysanity #please
Dear Gin & Tonic, you were the perfect end to a great day #neverchange #ontheroad
Dear long weekend, I may be catching up on some work but doing it by myself over brunch and coffee sure beats being in the office #truth
My water bottle was right where I left it. In the stationery cupboard. #sigh #welldoneme
People who don't put the milk back in the fridge after they are finished with it should be shot #somepeople #honestly
Today has been a success because I remembered my new password for my work computer.
What a difference a good night's sleep makes! #beenawhile #booyah
@ontrays You must have been thinking of me. This is exactly what I want for Christmas! #hint
@tauhenare Yes, but did you call the cops to report the unsafe driving incident?
@kb blondish (with a v nice side part). I now have to pay my hairdresser vast sums to make it as glowing as yours.
I straightened my hair and there are no gale force winds or signs of rain! Yet... #success
Just remembered to set my alarm clock for the morning but chances are high that Mr 1 will magnanimously oblige well in advance #mumlife
Right sleep, if you're missing me I can assure you I'm missing you more #comeback #mustfindcarbs
Dear Gastro, I hate everything about you. You are mean. #sulk #feelingsorryformyself
At least I was in the office foyer when I remembered my keys were at my desk. This time.
Dear emails, there are simply too many of you to go through without coffee. Back soon. #firstdayback
Set my morning alarm for tomorrow. Waaaaah #mustnotforgetwork
PSA: The two best places for coffee in Blenheim: the coffee cart at the Farmers Market and The Burleigh on New Renwick Rd. #happyplace
Ah bed, you are wonderful.
Seriously Christchurch it's just rush hour, so can ya'll calm down so we all make it home alive and dent free?
Mr 1 is still sleeping (still!!!) so am somehow managing a quiet lunch while catching up on things (Twitter) #mostexcellent

Oh hello morning walk! #roadtrip #Wanaka https://t.co/YHNIMArHK2

Dear Chch, you were swell! A fun @FlyAirNZ exhibition at the Canterbury Museum and some downtime at the botanic gardens #roadtrip
Rookie mistake number 1: not turning my alarm off. #fixed
@TheHeindog We are in our way to Nelson, right now. My very important questions; Where Is The Good Coffee and Is There Any At The Market?
Why hello there Out of Office, I don't mind if I do #boom
@morgy85 Use a lawyer/conveyancer like you would in a non-estate agent sale.
Susan tired #almostdonefortheday
Three flights in one day and the manaakitanga of @FlyAirNZ has been top notch #loveyourwork
But it's okay, I found Fuel coffee so all is right with the world #Wellington #Airport #sodifferent
